blobs.changelog:
- Remove automatic Wi-Fi scanning in settings.
- Add Wi-Fi tx power limit slider.
- HA Long term statistic enabled on MQTT sensors.
- MQTT Sensors available in HA Energy Dashboard.
- P1 telegram counters in dashboard.
- Wi-Fi tx power output indicator in dashboard.
- Added device attribute during registration of sensors in HA (feature request https://github.com/remne/p1ib/issues/1).

- Change HA sensor state_class for ackumulative sensors from measurement to total_increasing to align with latest Home Assistant update.
NOTE: Might break on older versions of HA.

- Wi-Fi reconnect instead of restart on ap disconnect.
- General info cards always visible in dashboard.
- Fixed bug in settings when ssid contains weird characters.
- MQTT reconnect timout changed from 10min to 30secs and improved connection handling.
